info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 03 at 1:51PM MST until October 03 at 4:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 151 PM MST, Very heavy rainfall continues across the southern Hualapai Mountains and near Yucca. Rainfall amounts exceeding 1 inch in the past hour were observed at Hibernia Peak. Flash flooding remains probable across mountain roads in the Hualapai Mountains and low water crossings in Golden Valley and Yucca. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kingman, Yucca, Wikieup, Wild Cow Campground, Hualapai Mountain Park, Dw Ranch Road and Hualapai Peak. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
